# Card

Simple card implementation.


<docs-demo-six-card-0></docs-demo-six-card-0>

```html
<six-card>
  <h1>Lorem ipsum.</h1>
  <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
  <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
  <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
  <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
  <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
  <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
</six-card>
```
